item.title: Algorithms
item.description: Algorithms are a set of step-by-step procedures or rules performed in a specific order to achieve a particular goal or solve a specific problem. In programming, algorithms form the backbone of effective problem-solving and efficient code execution. In this article, we will explore different aspects of algorithms, using examples in Python, while keeping the explanations as generic as possible. What is an algorithm? An algorithm is a precise sequence of instructions for processes that can be implemented in a programming language and executed by a computer.
